original_text: I ask each of you again: ‘Do you speak against people who do bad things, but you do those same bad things yourself?’ Then God will certainly punish you and you will not go free.
korean_text: 이런 일을 행하는 자를 판단하고도 같은 일을 행하는 사람아, 네가 하나님의 심판을 피할 줄로 생각하느냐

sentences.original_text: I ask each of you again
'Do you speak against people who do bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 나쁜 일을 하는 사람들을 비난하면서

sentences.original_text: but you do those same bad things yourself?'
sentences.korean_translation: 스스로는 그와 똑같은 나쁜 일을 하고 있습니까?'

sentences.original_text: Then God will certainly punish you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 하나님은 반드시 당신을 벌하실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and you will not go free.
